Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: rebuild team page with TheSportsDB database integration

Implement complete team page reconstruction using pure TheSportsDB data
instead of external APIs. Adds new features including social media links,
stadium information, form guides, and Highlightly live data integration.

Changes:
- Add TeamPageDB component with database-driven architecture
- Add 7 new API functions for TheSportsDB data fetching
- Add 5 new TypeScript types for database schema
- Add test script validating all API functions
- Update router to use new TeamPageDB component

New Features:
- Social media links (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube)
- Stadium details with capacity and location
- Form guide visualization (W/D/L badges)
- Home/Away record separation
- Highlightly live data integration support

Technical Details:
- Uses teams, standings, events, events_highlightly_enhanced tables
- Maintains existing UI/UX design for consistency
- All tests passing (36/36)
- TypeScript strict mode compliant
- Production build successful (17.96 kB gzipped: 4.01 kB)
